Uses of Interface
org.jppf.management.NodeSelector

  • Packages that use NodeSelector 
    Package Description
    org.jppf.management
    Support for the JMX-based management of JPPF components.
    org.jppf.management.forwarding
    Support for forwarding JMX requests to the nodes, along with receiving notifications from them, via the JPPF driver's JMX server.

    • Uses of NodeSelector in org.jppf.management

      Classes in org.jppf.management that implement NodeSelector 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  NodeSelector.AllNodesSelector
      Selects all nodes.
      static class  NodeSelector.ExecutionPolicySelector
      Selects nodes based on an ExecutionPolicy.
      static class  NodeSelector.UuidSelector
      Selects nodes based on their uuids.
      Fields in org.jppf.management declared as NodeSelector 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static NodeSelector NodeSelector.ALL_NODES
      Constant for a selector which accepts all nodes.
      Methods in org.jppf.management with parameters of type NodeSelector 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String JMXDriverConnectionWrapper.registerForwardingNotificationListener(NodeSelector selector, String mBeanName, NotificationListener listener, NotificationFilter filter, Object handback)
      Register a notification listener which will receive notifications from from the specified MBean on the selected nodes.
      void JPPFDriverAdminMBean.toggleActiveState(NodeSelector selector)
      Toggle the activate state of the specified nodes.
      void JMXDriverConnectionWrapper.toggleActiveState(NodeSelector selector) 

    • Uses of NodeSelector in org.jppf.management.forwarding

      Methods in org.jppf.management.forwarding with parameters of type NodeSelector 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<String,Object> JPPFNodeForwardingMBean.cancelJob(NodeSelector selector, String jobId, Boolean requeue)
      Cancel the job with the specified id in the specified nodes.
      Map<String,Object> JPPFNodeForwardingMBean.forwardGetAttribute(NodeSelector selector, String name, String attribute)
      Get the value of an attribute of the specified MBean for each specified node.
      Map<String,Object> JPPFNodeForwardingMBean.forwardInvoke(NodeSelector selector, String name, String methodName)
      Convenience method to invoke an MBean method that has no parameter.
      Map<String,Object> JPPFNodeForwardingMBean.forwardInvoke(NodeSelector selector, String name, String methodName, Object[] params, String[] signature)
      Invoke a method on the specified MBean of all nodes attached to the driver.
      Map<String,Object> JPPFNodeForwardingMBean.forwardSetAttribute(NodeSelector selector, String name, String attribute, Object value)
      Set the value of an attribute of the specified MBean on the specified nodes attached to the driver.
      Map<String,Object> JPPFNodeForwardingMBean.gc(NodeSelector selector)
      Invoke System.gc() on the specified nodes.
      Map<String,Object> JPPFNodeForwardingMBean.getDelegationModel(NodeSelector selector)
      Get the current class loader delegation model for the specified nodes.
      Map<String,Object> JPPFNodeForwardingMBean.healthSnapshot(NodeSelector selector)
      Get the JVM health snapshot for the specified nodes.
      Map<String,Object> JPPFNodeForwardingMBean.resetTaskCounter(NodeSelector selector)
      Reset the specified nodes' executed tasks counter to zero.
      Map<String,Object> JPPFNodeForwardingMBean.restart(NodeSelector selector)
      Restart the specified nodes.
      Map<String,Object> JPPFNodeForwardingMBean.setDelegationModel(NodeSelector selector, DelegationModel model)
      Set the current class loader delegation model for the specified nodes.
      Map<String,Object> JPPFNodeForwardingMBean.setTaskCounter(NodeSelector selector, Integer n)
      Reset the specified nodes' executed tasks counter to the specified value.
      Map<String,Object> JPPFNodeForwardingMBean.shutdown(NodeSelector selector)
      Shutdown the specified nodes.
      Map<String,Object> JPPFNodeForwardingMBean.state(NodeSelector selector)
      Get the latest state information from the node.
      Map<String,Object> JPPFNodeForwardingMBean.systemInformation(NodeSelector selector)
      Get the system information for the specified nodes.
      Map<String,Object> JPPFNodeForwardingMBean.threadDump(NodeSelector selector)
      Get a JVM thread dump for the specified nodes.
      Map<String,Object> JPPFNodeForwardingMBean.updateConfiguration(NodeSelector selector, Map<Object,Object> config, Boolean reconnect)
      Update the configuration properties of the specified nodes.
      Map<String,Object> JPPFNodeForwardingMBean.updateThreadPoolSize(NodeSelector selector, Integer size)
      Set the size of the specified nodes' thread pool.
      Map<String,Object> JPPFNodeForwardingMBean.updateThreadsPriority(NodeSelector selector, Integer newPriority)
      Update the priority of all execution threads for the specified nodes.
